pullRequest.title: SAK-43149 Fix the handling of OR required functions, in page order

nodes.bodyText:
The rest of the PR looks awesome bu I don't get this part. I love the rest of the changes but
getRequiredPermissions(SitePage page) still seems confusing to me. What happens if the tools.size() > 1? Perhaps you're not changing the logic here though and this is the same as it was.
